I've never seen a game go from being a 4.5 star game for me to a 0. The devs broke this game so bad by choosing to not listen to the community and dropping this new update. Animations are trash, all you can do now is basically run straight until a killer hits you and the hitboxes are abysmal so the killer hits you from ten feet away. The hud is going to produce a generation of lazy eyed people. DO NOT play this game or spend any money on it until they revert or fix it. This game is unplayable as is. Don't waste your time.

The camping that happens in this game puts COD to shame. I've played this game for a while now, and I used to love it. This is one of those games that would challenge you, and put you up against all odds making the smallest victories feel massive. The perks and variety of characters and monsters kept me coming back and still do to this day. It was unforgiving, but just challenging enough to be a fun time for masochists. ENTER THE LATEST UPDATE. If you haven't seen it yet, they changed... a few things.... and definitely not for the better. Ill spare you the mass content, cause you can literally see the thousands of negative reviews out there as of late to see what the issues are. But really read ANY of the negative reviews as of late. They're all correct, and as a fan of what this game used to be, it hurts to see. Its literally like watching your favourite nephew grow up with a promising career, then turn suddenly into a hardcore drug addict that gets into fist fights with their dad over family seating arrangements. Then one day a year later you just see them washed up on a street corner offering free sex to strangers, just to feel something. And in that moment, you remind yourself of who they used to be. You're reminded of all the times you'd hang out and play video games, the birthday celebrations, the family holidays, actually being exited to see them... and now... its not fun, its some taxing emotional obligation to check up on them and make sure they don't end up in prison next week.
I wish I was wrong. I wish I was the only one who felt this way, and above all else I wish I could recommend this game to friends. I cant. I care about this game. I care about this game's community. I still do play this game on occasion (albeit more than often just to play with friends who don't have other multiplayer games). I want nothing more than to see Dead by daylight turn itself around again, but as of right now its just accelerating in reverse. This game isn't just bad...for all of us die hard horror game fans... its been...heartbreaking...

With the new update, I would like to write an actual review. This is my personal opinion based solely on the game (I'm not going to go into the system requirements or anything technical or similar), so if there are certain points you don't agree with or something I wrote that seems wrong, I'm sorry. These are based on my feelings about the game and the experiences I've had. 
(For the record I had the game on the Xbox for about a year and recently bought it on my PC. I have maybe equal or double my playtime on the Xbox than on PC) 

Pros:
The atmosphere is amazing. I genuinely feel a sense of fear, stress, and anxiety from all of the killers on every map, and I love the immersion I get from it.
The music overall is very well done. From the lobby music to killer chase music, you can tell a lot of work has gone into it. I could get the theme stuck in my head for hours. It is very catchy.
The gameplay itself is unique and stands out among other horror games.
The survivor, killer, and graphics overall are very well done. The detail that has gone into certain killers, survivors, and map structures is amazing. 
The cinematics are beautiful. The current opening cinematic is incredibly well done. 
The lore is pretty interesting. Certain character backstories are less in-depth than others (looking at you Dwight), but I love that every original killer and survivor has their own unique backstory. 
If you disconnect from a public game, you get locked out of joining another for a certain amount of time. I like this because it prevents dodgy people from constantly avoiding games with killers they don't like. The consequences for disconnecting are relatively good, in my opinion. 

Cons:
The devs DO NOT listen to the community, and the game has suffered because of it. Examples would be the community asking them to nerf The Doctor or the No One Escapes Death hex, of which neither has been done.
With the new update, hitboxes for survivors have gotten bigger. In my experience, this means that when I'm in a chase and the killer isn't directly behind me (I can't see the red stain that shows where they're looking), I still get hit. I'll give the benefit of the doubt and say maybe it was because of a charged attack or lag but I'm assuming it isn't just me after what I've seen from the community and from what I've heard from friends. 
The wait times are sometimes absolutely atrocious, and this has been an issue for years. I find around 6:00 pm CST the wait times for survivor matches are incredibly long (even if you have a full party of four survivors). 
It seems more work has gone into DLC killers gameplay-wise (Ghostface, The Shape, The Pig, etc.) This is a small nit-picky thing that doesn't bother me, but it seems as though players who only have base game killers are put at a relatively significant disadvantage. 
In general, the reporting system in DBD is useless. Any harassment you get from toxic survivors or killers or camping/tunneling killers is essentially ignored. 

TL;DR:
All in all, this game is done very well in a broad view, and I do think it's fun, but the details are what is killing it. I didn't touch on everything I liked or everything that I had a problem with, but I believe I got the point across. I do recommend it but certainly do not buy it for the full price, wait for a discount if possible. (At the time of this review, it's on discount from its original price at 19.99 to 11.99).

I have the biggest love-hate relationship with this game. While I despise the developers and toxic players who have run this game into the ground, it is unfair to state that the overall gameplay isn't awful. Now, this game is nowhere near perfect in it's current state, but with some of the recent reworkings and perk changes, I believe this game has become fairly balanced. When I say balanced, I mean that the playing survivor doesn't guarantee you an escape as it did many years ago. But once you get to the higher ranks, it tends to become easier with more skilled teammates. However, I only have one current standing issue in this game. Toxicity. This game is by far the most toxic and unappealing game I have ever seen. From the basics of sandbagging and face-camping, to the complexities of gen-rushing and 4-man SWFs. I tend to stay away from playing killer due to these toxic mannerisms that have unfortunately become normalized, although the killer can be toxic in many ways as well. 

All in all, I can't stay away from this game. It always pulls me back in and, honestly, maybe I just have commitment issues, but it always works. Anyway, this game is phenomenally awful and I love it for that. However, still get it on sale.

Honestly? I find this game far too addictive. Hilarious clusterfuck most of the time and an absolute delight to play. 

Sure, the new update in February changed a *lot* of things all at once. But people really seem to be overreacting to this. It'll take time to adjust to the new style, obviously, but the devs work hard on this game and, despite what people say, do actually play their own game. As usual you get people thinking they know what is best for the game when they don't even have all the information. 

Definitely plan on spending a lot more hours on this glorious shitshow of a game. :)

首先我也算个萌新玩家吧，最高段人类紫段，共玩了71.6小时，经历了新旧版本交替，不得不说这次更新是真的垃圾。
已经让我无话可说，人物走动怪异，屠夫刀气纵横八万里，屠夫三年之期已满？以前可以看红光交钢筋，现在连红光还没到身上，刀气已经砍我后颈了，你比兵长还能砍呀。还动不动无视转角刀。
其次进去后这个界面，真就生怕别人一眼能把信息获取完，左下角工具配件瞩目，你说我需要看的我带的什么配件吗？开局我带什么我心里没逼数进去还要再看？左上角的人物状态栏真是有够可笑的呢，一个3D游戏人物模型坑坑洼洼，头像还整挺好，回头再加个聊天系统，那不是更美？以前可以一眼分辨的东西现在要重新认知，本来游戏节奏就很紧张，这样一搞，更托节奏了。最主要的电机数给我放到顶上，还做了淡化处理，生怕我知道还有几台机。
综上所述，我开始后悔入手这款游戏，要是还能退款，我一点也不留恋，就是因为看着花出去的钱才愿意玩下去，不然就这种怎么留住玩家，改的稀碎。
服务器也不优化，不开加速器国服都玩不了，但现在也没国服了，黎明杀机？排到黎明吧，找个对局能找五六分钟，合着真的是玩杀机打发时间？
现在真的不想玩这个游戏了，要么改回去，挽救本就日落西山的游戏。要么就关服退款。
这次更新针不戳，祝排队黎明越来越火，老期待还有什么阴间更新等着我呢，加油，祝你赚的盆满钵满。
